definition.val: The number of cigarettes that are sold within a pack.
A portable cannabis vaporiser that resembles an inhaler and sold under the brand name PUFFiT.
An e-cigarette that has a refillable pod.
A product that is composed of a substance in the liquid state.
A flavoured e-liquid in which the flavourant has a menthol taste.
An e-cigarette that has no circuitry and power is provided by the battery alone.
A part of a THC vaping device.
A part of a heated tobacco-containing product.
An e-cigarette part that is designed for use on a mechanical mod, it has an inbuilt reservoir for e-liquid,  this is fed to a dripper by either squeezing or pumping the reservoir.
An e-cigarette part that constitutes the container used to hold e-liquid.

A combustible tobacco-containing product that is a cylinder formed of chopped tobacco encased in tobacco leaf. The user sets one end alight and ingests smoke by sucking on the other end. The cylinder becomes shorter as the tobacco burns to smoke and ash until either the user extinguishes the burning tobacco or all the tobacco is burnt.

comments: This definition includes large panatelas and small cigars. Cigars typically produce smoke with a high concentration of nicotine so that a significant amount of nicotine can be absorbed through the lining of the mouth without the smoke having to be inhaled into the lungs.

definition.val: An e-liquid that contains THC.
An e-cigarette part that constitutes the heating element that vaporises an e-liquid.
An e cigarette consisting of a separate  refillable tank, drip tip, coil and rechargeable battery.
A cigarette made of tobacco and cloves.
An e-liquid that contains a flavourant.
An e-cigarette with a refillable tank.
An e-liquid that has a high concentration of nicotine.
A part of a product.
A cigalike e-cigarette that has a rechargeable battery.
A product that is formed from parts of tobacco plants.
A nicotine delivery product that has a medicinal licence within a specified territory.
A tabletop vaporiser that is designed to vape oil based cannabis products.

comments: Clarify what cannabis is being vaped i.e. CBD or THC and where possible what %

definition.val: An electronic vaping device that is hand held and produces for inhalation an aerosol formed by heating an e-liquid.

comments: The e-liquid contains one or more humectants , usually together with flavourants and nicotine. The heating is achieved by means of a battery-powered heating elementthat is activated by a switch or by suction as the user sucks on the mouthpiece of the device.

basicPropertyValues.val: The primary label is based on the fact that this is a the most commonly used term and is clear. It has the disadvantage that it carries negative connotations in some quarters but other terminology does not adequately capture this class as defined.

definition.val: A tobacco-containing product in which the tobacco is processed to make it suitable for burning for the user to ingest the smoke.
A cigar which has been emptied of its tobacco and replaced with cannabis.
An e-cigarette that can be self-built and modified by the user.
A smokeless tobacco-containing product that is dry and is formed of ground tobacco and is ingested by a person into the nasal cavity.
A part of a vaping device.
A product that is designed in most cases for the purpose of ingestion of one or more constituents of tobacco, not including products that have a medicinal licence.

comments: An FDA defined tobacco product is any  product that meets the definition of a tobacco product set out in the United States Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act and as interpreted by the courts. It is any product made or derived from tobacco that is intended for human consumption, including any component, part, or accessory of a tobacco product . It does not include an article that is a drug. This class is not coherent and is best avoided in scientific discourse because, despite the label, it includes products that have no tobacco constituents in them  and excludes products that do have the tobacco constituent nicotine .

basicPropertyValues.val: This class is required because it is used by US the Food and Drug Administration's Center for Tobacco Products to classify products over which it has jurisdiction.

definition.val: A product of the tobacco plant that has been processed for use within tobacco-containing products.
A closed e-cigarette system, that has a non-rechargeable battery and no replaceable parts.
An e-cigarette that has a rechargeable battery and refillable tank characterised by its penlike shape.
A flavoured e-liquid in which the flavourant has a tobacco taste.
A product standard for e-cigarettes.
An e-cigarette part that constitutes the atomiser surrounded by a liquid-soaked poly-foam that acts as an e-liquid holder.
An e-cigarette that is pen shaped.
A cigaratte that is  flavoured with the compound menthol.
An e-cigarette that has a rechargeable battery.
An e-cigarette that has a refillable pod and is marketed by the JUUL company.
A cigarette that is manufactured within a factory.
An e-cigarette atomiser which has only one power level.

A combustible tobacco-containing product that is a thin cylinder of finely cut tobacco encased in cigarette paper. The user sets one end alight and ingests smoke by sucking on the other end. The cylinder becomes shorter as the tobacco burns to smoke and ash until either the user extinguishes the burning tobacco or all the tobacco is burnt.

comments: This definition includes hand-rolled cigarettes and manufactured cigarettes but not cigarillos, bidis or small cigars. Cigarettes are typically made for the smoke to be inhaled into the lungs.

definition.val: A dry herb vaporiser that consists of an internal battery, a chamber for the THC and a mouthpiece.  It is small, simple to operate and is portable.
A tabletop vaporiser that is designed to vape cannabis flower or herbs
A vaping device that produces vapour or aerosol for inhalation by electrically heating a substance.
An e-cigarette atomiser which the user can adjust to different levels of power.
An e-liquid that is oil based and contains THC.
An e-cigarette part that is the container used to hold e-liquid.
An e-cigarette that has no tank and in which the e-liquid is 'dripped' straight on to the wick or coil.
Aproduct that contains or consists of tobacco and is used by people to ingest tobacco constituents.

comments: This class includes products that contain or consist of parts of the tobacco plant that have been subject to some form of processing. This class does not contain products that only contain nicotine. These are dealt with separately as 'nicotine-containing products'.

definition.val: An e-cigarette atomiser which is built by the end user.
A THC vaping device which are large, usually mains powdered and intended for use in one location.
An e-cigarette part that constitutes the electrical energy source of the device.
A tobacco-containing product that contains a tobacco stick that it heats to produce a vapour for inhalation by a person.
A cannabis vaping device that is is battery operated and therefore easy to carry around.

comments: Clarify what cannabis is being vaped i.e. CBD or THC and where possible what %

definition.val: A part of an e-cigarette.
A smokeless tobacco-containing product that is formed of ground tobacco and is consumed by a person by chewing.
A vaping device that is used by a person for the purpose of vaping THC.
An e cigarette part that is the tank for a CE4 e cigarette
A heated tobacco-containing product that is marketed by Philip Morris under the brand name iQOS.
An e-liquid that contains nicotine.

comments: The strength of the e-liquid should always be defined.

definition.val: An e-liquid that does not contain any flavourant.

basicPropertyValues.val: I wonder if here we should add this includes tobacco - as there is a common misperception that tobacco is non flavoured which of course it is

definition.val: A product that delivers nicotine without tobacco for ingestion.
A flavoured e-liquid in which the flavourant has a mint taste.
An e-cigarette that has a pre-filled disposable pod.
A cigarette pack which contains the full product brand name, logo or visual motif imprinted on it.
A closed e-cigarette system that is characterised by its cigalike appearance and has a non-rechargeable battery and no replaceable parts.
An oil based liquid product that is used in some THC vaping devices for the purpose of aerosolization and inhalation by a person.
A THC vaping device part that is formed of disposable non-refillable cartridge which is attached to a device for the purpose of consuming THC.
A liquid product that is used in e-cigarettes for the purpose of aerosolization and inhalation by a person.

comments: Typically consists of propylene glycol or glycerol together with nicotine and flavourants.

definition.val: A flavoured e-liquid in which the flavourant has a sweet taste.

comments: Sweet flavours include a broad range of flavour choices but they are distinct from fruit flavours and therefore  need to described.

basicPropertyValues.val: 13% of e-cigarette users report having tried a sweet flavoured e-liquid, e.g., candy floss.

definition.val: A product that produces for inhalation by a person a vapour or aerosol by heating a substance that may be either liquid or solid.
Products made from the THC extracts of the cannabis plant which are processed ito result in a higher concentration of THC and can come in various shapes, sizes and forms.
An e-cigarette that has a refillable tank which is filled with e-liquid manually by the user.
An e-cigarette that resembles a tobacco cigarette in shape, size and appearance.
A cigar that is short and thin with wrapping that can be tobacco or tobacco-based paper.
An e-cigarette part that allows the user to draw through a vapourised aerosol.
A heated tobacco-containing product part that has been processed to make it suitable for use in a heated tobacco product.
A tobacco-containing product in which the tobacco is processed for use in a manner that does not involve combustion.

comments: This class includes all tobacco-containing products whose use does not involve burning. It does not include products whose only tobacco-related constituent is nicotine. Those are in the class of nicotine-containing products. It includes chewing tobacco and snus.

definition.val: A combustible tobacco-containing product that consists of cigarettes contained in a pack.
A THC vaping device that consists of an internal batter, a chamber for the THC and a mouthpiece.  They are small, simple to operate and portable.

comments: Clarify what cannabis is being vaped i.e. CBD or THC and where possible what %

definition.val: A part of a tobacco-containing product.
A part of an e-cigarette that is the microchip with the purpose of recording vaping behaviour.
An electronic vaping device that is designed to mimic the experience of smoking a shisha pipe.
An e-cigarette part that constitutes the heating element and must be replaced after use.
An object that is manufactured or processed for sale.

basicPropertyValues.val: Original definition says 'An object or substance' but substance would be an object aggregate in BFO so we have just used object

definition.val: A smokeless tobacco-containing product that is composed mainly or exclusively of moist, ground or powdered tobacco that is processed to make it suitable for use by a person placing it in the mouth between the gum and the cheek.

comments: This class includes snus as well as other oral ground or powdered tobacco products that are not chewed.

basicPropertyValues.val: People often confuse oral snuff with snus and it is important to recognise that snus is a subclass of oral snuff and not the same as it.

definition.val: A flavoured e-liquid in which the flavourant has a fruit taste.
